text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump Mike, I often forget to remind you that you’re a piece of shit too. I remind #PresidentFailure on a daily basis what an absolute asshole he is but it goes without saying that you’re a twisted prick all on your own. #MailInBallots #TrumpCoronavirusTestFailure #COVIDIOTS #COVID19
